dlentry.dd: The version of pre-installed Auto Provisioning App is 1.7.4.
The Queue Metrics Integration App is free, no more license from Yeastar is needed.

li.p: Fixed the issue that the SIP trunk advanced settings would be lost after upgrading the PBX.
Fixed the Allow Mode for SIP Forking issue: If Allow Mode for SIP Forking setting was enabled, a system hang would occur when a ring group member performed a blind transfer to another user.

ul.li: Fixed the Backup and Restore issue: The SIP trunk Outbound Parameters settings would be lost after restoring configurations from a backup file.
Fixed the Linkus Cloud Service issue: There was no audio on both parties for the outbound call that was made from Linkus client.
